mapper.sql: JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, JTJLK_BYXX, JTJLK_ZY, JTJLK_TXT, JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, JTJLK_YXPM, JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG
mapper.select: select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, (select top 1 RESUME_YXPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_YXPM, (select top 1 RESUME_BJPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG from JTJLK where JTJLK_ID = #{jtjlkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from JTJLK where JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = 2 and JTJLK_LY = '应聘者' and JTJLK_USERID = #{strUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select top 1
from JTJLK WHERE JTJLK_APCPGWLB = #{apcsLb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JTJLK_USERID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JTJLK_CPCJ not in('未完成','未通知')

select Z.ZZJG_DWMC SQDW, P.POSITION_ID PID, P.POSITION_NAME SQGW, CASE J.JTJLK_JLZT WHEN '未筛选' THEN '审查中' WHEN '录用' THEN '已录用' WHEN '淘汰' THEN '未录用' WHEN '已安排面试' THEN '已测评' ELSE '待测评' END JLSX, J.JTJLK_CPCJ CPCJ, J.JTJLK_MSZT MSJG, J.JTJLK_APCPGWLB APCPGWLB, J.JTJLK_ID JTJLKID, B.BMGL_ID BMGLID, B.BMGL_PRINTFLAG BMGLPRINTFLAG from POSITION P LEFT JOIN ZZJG Z ON Z.ZZJG_ID = P.ZZJG_ID LEFT JOIN JTJLK J ON P.POSITION_ID = J.JTJLK_POSITION_ID LEFT JOIN BMGL B ON B.BMGL_JTJLKID = J.JTJLK_ID LEFT JOIN USERINFO U ON J.JTJLK_USERID = U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by JTJLK_ADDTIME

select count(*) from JTJLK where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_JLZT != '淘汰' and JTJLK_JLZT != '录用' and JTJLK_MSZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}
and JTJLK_SFZH like '%${jtjlkSfzh}%'
SELECT * from JTJLK where JTJLK_ID in( select JTJLK_ID from MSQGL_DETAILED where MSQGL_DETAILED_LSZH_ID = #{msqId})

select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, JTJLK_STAR, JTJLK_TXT, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, (select top 1 RESUME_YXPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_YXPM, (select top 1 RESUME_BJPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG, (select BMGL_ID from BMGL where BMGL_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and BMGL_BKGW = JTJLK_APCPGWLB) bmglId from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from JTJLK T where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_JLZT != '淘汰' and JTJLK_JLZT != '录用' and JTJLK_MSZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}
and JTJLK_SFZH like '%${jtjlkSfzh}%'
order by T.JTJLK_STAR desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_STAR asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_STAR desc
order by T.JTJLK_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME desc

select count(*) from JTJLK as J where not exists(select 1 from JTJLK where J.JTJLK_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and J.JTJLK_ADDTIME > JTJLK_ADDTIME) AND JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}

select count(*) from JTJLK as J where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}

select count(*) from JTJLK as J where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ZZJG_ID IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN

and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}

select count(*) from JTJLK as J where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ZZJG_ID IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}

select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID,
JTJLK_YXPM,
JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG, (select BMGL_ID from BMGL where BMGL_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and BMGL_BKGW = JTJLK_APCPGWLB) bmglId from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from JTJLK as T where not exists(select 1 from JTJLK where T.JTJLK_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and T.JTJLK_ADDTIME > JTJLK_ADDTIME) and JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}
order by T.JTJLK_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME desc

select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, (select top 1 RESUME_YXPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_YXPM, (select top 1 RESUME_BJPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG, (select BMGL_ID from BMGL where BMGL_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and BMGL_BKGW = JTJLK_APCPGWLB) bmglId from (select top 1 * from (select top 1 * from JTJLK as T where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1 and JTJLK_ID = '${head}' order by T.JTJLK_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME desc

select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, (select top 1 RESUME_YXPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_YXPM, (select top 1 RESUME_BJPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG, (select BMGL_ID from BMGL where BMGL_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and BMGL_BKGW = JTJLK_APCPGWLB) bmglId from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from JTJLK as T where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and ZZJG_ID IN
#{item2}
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}
order by T.JTJLK_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME desc

select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, (select z.ZZJG_DWMC from ZZJG z where z.ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) zzjgName, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, (select top 1 RESUME_YXPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_YXPM, (select top 1 RESUME_BJPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG, (select BMGL_ID from BMGL where BMGL_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and BMGL_BKGW = JTJLK_APCPGWLB) bmglId from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from JTJLK as T where JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}
and JTJLK_ID in '(' ${jtjlZzjgIds} ')'
order by T.JTJLK_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME desc

select JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, (select top 1 RESUME_XXMC from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_BYXX, (select top 1 RESUME_ZY from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_ZY, (select top 1 RESUME_XL from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc)JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, (select top 1 RESUME_YXPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_YXPM, (select top 1 RESUME_BJPM from RESUME_JYJL R left join XL X on X.XL_NAME = R.RESUME_XL where R.RESUME_ID = JTJLK_USERID order by X.XL_ORDER desc) JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG, (select BMGL_ID from BMGL where BMGL_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and BMGL_BKGW = JTJLK_APCPGWLB) bmglId from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from JTJLK as T where not exists(select 1 from JTJLK where T.JTJLK_SFZH = JTJLK_SFZH and T.JTJLK_ADDTIME > JTJLK_ADDTIME) and JTJLK_DELFLAG = 1
and ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_NAME like '%${jtjlkName}%'
and JTJLK_BYXX like '%${jtjlkByyx}%'
and JTJLK_ZY like '%${jtjlkZy}%'
and JTJLK_XL like '%${jtjlkXl}%'
and JTJLK_ZW like '%${jtjlkZw}%'
and JTJLK_GWLB like '%${jtjlkGwlb}%'
and JTJLK_POSITION_ID = '${jtjlkPositionId}'
and JTJLK_CPCJ != '未通知' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%通过%' and JTJLK_CPJG not like '%淘汰%'
and JTJLK_JLZT IN
#{item}
and JTJLK_ID like '%${jtjlkId}%'
and JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and JTJLK_HKD like '%${jtjlkHkd}%'
and JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = ${jtjlkJtjlkflag}
order by T.JTJLK_ADDTIME desc ) as t1 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME asc) as t2 order by JTJLK_ADDTIME desc

select
from JTJLK where JTJLK_USERID = #{jtjlkUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JTJLK_APCPGWLB = #{jtjlkApcpgwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into JTJLK (JTJLK_ID, ZZJG_ID, JTJLK_NAME, JTJLK_SEX, JTJLK_BYXX, JTJLK_ZY, JTJLK_XL, JTJLK_ZW, JTJLK_JLZT, JTJLK_MSZT, JTJLK_CPJG, JTJLK_ADDTIME, JTJLK_DELFLAG, JTJLK_CPCJ, JTJLK_USERID, JTJLK_GWLB, JTJLK_POSITION_ID, JTJLK_APCPGWLB, JTJLK_ZZLYGW, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID, JTJLK_YXPM, JTJLK_BJPM, JTJLK_HKD, JTJLK_LY, JTJLK_OLDID, JTJLK_CSRQ, JTJLK_SFZH, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG, JTJLK_TTQJLZT ,JTJLK_TTQMSZT ,JTJLK_TTQCPJG) values (#{jtjlkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkByxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkZy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkXl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkZw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkJlzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkMszt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkCpjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jtjlkDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{jtjlkCpcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkGwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkApcpgwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkZzlygw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkZzlygwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkYxpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkBjpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkHkd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkOldid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkCsrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkJtjlkflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jtjlkTtqjlzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkTtqmszt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jtjlkTtqcpjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update JTJLK
ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTJLK_NAME = #{jtjlkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTJLK_SEX = #{jtjlkSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTJLK_BYXX = #{jtjlkByxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

JTJLK_DELFLAG = #{jtjlkDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
JTJLK_CPCJ = #{jtjlkCpcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTJLK_USERID = #{jtjlkUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTJLK_GWLB = #{jtjlkGwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JTJLK_POSITION_ID = #{jtjlkPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where JTJLK_ID = #{jtjlkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update JTJLK set ZZJG_ID = #{zzjgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_NAME = #{jtjlkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_SEX = #{jtjlkSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_BYXX = #{jtjlkByxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_ZY = #{jtjlkZy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_XL = #{jtjlkXl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_ZW = #{jtjlkZw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_JLZT = #{jtjlkJlzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_MSZT = #{jtjlkMszt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_CPJG = #{jtjlkCpjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_ADDTIME = #{jtjlkAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JTJLK_DELFLAG = #{jtjlkDelflag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JTJLK_CPCJ = #{jtjlkCpcj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_USERID = #{jtjlkUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_GWLB = #{jtjlkGwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_POSITION_ID = #{jtjlkPositionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_APCPGWLB = #{jtjlkApcpgwlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_ZZLYGW = #{jtjlkZzlygw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_ZZLYGW_ID = #{jtjlkZzlygwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_YXPM = #{jtjlkYxpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_BJPM = #{jtjlkBjpm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_HKD = #{jtjlkHkd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_LY = #{jtjlkLy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_OLDID = #{jtjlkOldid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_CSRQ = #{jtjlkCsrq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_SFZH = #{jtjlkSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_JTJLKFLAG = #{jtjlkJtjlkflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JTJLK_TTQJLZT = #{jtjlkTtqjlzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_TTQMSZT = #{jtjlkTtqmszt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JTJLK_TTQCPJG = #{jtjlkTtqcpjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JTJLK_ID = #{jtjlkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
